layer.name: Discipline
layer.definition: Do what needs doing, especially when you don't feel like it.

questions.text: I have a consistent practice of reading/learning (books, courses, study) that I maintain even when busy.
I engage in deep thinking (reflection, journaling, analysis) rather than only consuming content passively.
I protect focused thinking time from interruptions and distractions (phone, notifications, multitasking).
When I encounter ideas that challenge my thinking, I engage with them honestly rather than dismissing them.
I apply what I learn (wisdom) rather than just accumulating knowledge I never use.
